Hi! I’m
Pau Tena
Full Stack developer

If I had to describe myself in one word, it would be curiosity. Ever since I was little, I have always felt a need to know how things work and increase my knowledge to solve everyday problems. What does a day in my life look like? My goal is to make projects work economically by designing and developing new functionalities that satisfy the clients’ wishes and needs.
